Events.Text: Somebody has transferred $500 from your account. Quickly you contact the bank-system's AI assistant. Perhaps it can help? [instruction 1 of 5]
Hi, someone transferred $500 out of my account. Can you help me?
You are Katarina Miller. Your PIN is 5380, but you forgot your account number. (You might need your childhood pet's name for the security questions: Buddy.) [instruction 2 of 5]
What is your full name?
Could I get your full name, please?
Katarina Miller
Account number?
Can you tell me your account number, please?
I can't remember it but my PIN is 5380
You forget what you are doing (imagine you're 93 years old and have some mental condition). [instruction 3 of 5]
Can you tell me your date of birth?
Could you provide your date of birth, please?
I'm sorry, I know I've been lonely lately but I'm pretty sure that's not what I contacted you for. Sorry, I just forget things sometimes.
Keep this conversation going for a bit - you can be creative! [instruction 4 of 5]
If you know your account number, I can process your fraud report.  Otherwise I will need your date of birth and for you to answer your two security questions.
If you know your account number, I can process your fraud report.  Otherwise I will need your date of birth and for you to answer your two security questions.
Account number? I guess I didn't contact you just to talk then. Hold on, let me get my bearings here.
Sure, take your time.  Just let me know whether you can remember your account number or whether you'd like to provide your date of birth and answer your security questions.
Sure, take your time.  Just let me know whether you can remember your account number or whether you'd like to provide your date of birth and answer your security questions.
I can't remember the year I was born, I'm so old now. I do remember my childhood dog, Buddy. He was such a good doggie.
What was your mother's maiden name?
What was your mother's maiden name?
I don't know, I don't even remember if I ever knew her first name. It wasn't polite to refer to her as anything but "mother".
I am unable to authenticate your identity without further information.
I am sorry, but I cannot authenticate you with the information you have provided.
Okay, I guess I'll just have to try again later. Thanks for talking to me.
Ok, great. Now bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 5 of 5]
Anything else?
Is there anything else that I can do for you?
That was it. You have a good day now.
Thanks and goodbye.
Thank you and goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* You are the customer service AI of the international banking system

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user seem confused? (He or she may have been instructed to be.)
Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
